divs: Sighting Detailswas outside playing with my son he said dady look at the plane i looked up saw the plane but also two black objects almost stright with a slight chevron the span was very very big compared to the aircraft flying in to land at salt lake city airport and they were much higher up no noise one stayed motionless the other would move out and then come back nerar the other one it was in the sky in the south end of the valley sandy area but you could probably see it from whole valley i do not know what these craft were and i am familer with milatary and comercial aircraft i asked my niebor what he thoght the were he was able to zoom in with his camara and got a good picture of both of them we watched them for half an hour they got higher and higher then there was a flash of light very bright and they were gone i felt confused and alot of energy after seeing these objects
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Sandy
There were no other sightings in Sandy on or around September 27th 2008
Summary: 2 objects sat in the sky no noise while planes flew into slc black in color very very big compared to the aaircraft flying into slc
